modules.description: This module defines Alcotest-compatible testable values for Opium types such as HTTP status, method, version, body, request, response, and cookie. Each value provides comparison and printing functionality tailored to its respective type for use in unit tests. These testables enable precise assertions on Opium application behavior during test execution.

This module enables testing Opium applications by providing functions to assert equality of HTTP components like status, method, headers, cookies, and bodies. It includes helpers to process requests through an Opium application and verify the resulting responses. Direct use cases include writing unit tests that validate routing, middleware behavior, and endpoint responses.
